nodes.text: Sídi was a planetoid in the Outer Rim Territories. It was gray and cold, with only humans and ash-beetles thriving. During the Clone Wars, it was the site of an old communications tower and Rank and Leera's inn. When the wind blew from the east, Sídi was noted to smell like rotten eggs.
Sídi appeared in the 2020 short story "Bug" by E. Anne Convery, included in the anthology The Clone Wars: Stories of Light and Dark.
